full_text:
Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
From
(b)(5)
(NBCUniversal)
To
Lee Plourde
Date
2019/08/11 18:56
Subject:
Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments:
TEXT.htm, Mime.822
Just FYI
Sent from my iPhone
Begin forwarded message:
From: (b)(5)
(NBCUniversal)" (b)(5) @nbcuni.com>
Date: August 11, 2019 at 6:53:42 PM EDT
To: (b)(5)
(NBCUniversal)" (b)(5) @nbcuni.com>
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
So no further info will be put out tonight? Right? Just need to figure out if I should move George off of it now. Thanks again!
From: (b)(5)
(NBCUniversal)
Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 6:52 PM
To: @NBC Uni Wnbc News Updates <WnbcNewsUpdates@nbcuni.com>
Subject: Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
Sent from my iPhone
Begin forwarded message:
From: (b)(3)
(OCME)" <(b)(6)
@ocme.nyc.gov>
Date: August 11, 2019 at 6:51:20 PM EDT
To: (b)(6)
(OCME)" (b)(6) @ocme.nyc.gov>
Subject: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
***IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE REMOVED FROM OCME'S PRESS LIST, PLEASE EMAIL (b)(6)
@OCME.NYC.GOV WITH THE SUBJECT TITLE: UNSUBSCRIBE***
The Chief Medical Examiner released the below statement today:
"Today, a medical examiner performed the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein. The ME's determination is pending further information at this time. At the request of those representing the decedent, and with the awareness of the federal prosecutor, I allowed a private pathologist (Dr. Michael Baden) to

So no further info will be put out tonight? Right? Just need to figure out if I should move George off of it now. Thanks again!
Subject: Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
Subject: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
***IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE REMOVED FROM OCME'S PRESS LIST, PLEASE EMAIL (b)(6) @OCME.NYC.GOV WITH THE SUBJECT TITLE: UNSUBSCRIBE***
The Chief Medical Examiner released the below statement today:

"Today, a medical examiner performed the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein. The ME's determination is pending further information at this time. At the request of those representing the decedent, and with the awareness of the federal prosecutor, I allowed a private pathologist (Dr. Michael Baden) to

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein and the pending determination by the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME). The emails contain redactions, indicated by (b)(5), (b)(3), and (b)(6), which are likely related to privacy or confidentiality concerns.
